meanings.definition: Willing to help or do favors for others.
meanings.sent1: She is so accommodating, always ready to lend a hand to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The accommodating neighbor offered to water the plants while we were away.
meanings.sent3: The accommodating waiter happily brought extra napkins with a smile.
meanings.sent4: His accommodating nature was like a warm blanket on a chilly day.
meanings.sent5: The accommodating teacher patiently answered all the students' questions.

meanings.definition: Able to adjust or adapt to different situations.
meanings.sent1: Being accommodating, she quickly changed her plans to fit the group's schedule.
meanings.sent2: The accommodating team smoothly transitioned to the new project requirements.
meanings.sent3: The accommodating GPS recalculated the route after a wrong turn.
meanings.sent4: His accommodating mindset was like a key that unlocked any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The accommodating software seamlessly integrated with other programs.

meanings.definition: Providing space or room for something.
meanings.sent1: The accommodating closet had shelves for all her shoes.
meanings.sent2: The accommodating parking lot had plenty of spots for visitors.
meanings.sent3: The accommodating suitcase magically fit all the souvenirs she bought.
meanings.sent4: The accommodating garden welcomed the new plants with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The accommodating venue had enough seating for everyone at the event.
